pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, May 28, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

Closed to media.

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the United Nations High-Level Event on Financing for Development in the Era of COVID-19 and Beyond.

The event will be streamed online at http://webtv.un.org, as well as http://twitter.com/UNWebTV.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a joint press conference with the Secretary-General of the United Nations, António Guterres, and the Prime Minister of Jamaica, Andrew Holness.

The event will be streamed online at http://webtv.un.org, as well as http://twitter.com/UNWebTV.
